top_comment.text:
*CRAZY OF THE WEEK*
Once a week I give my half a cent thought of the CRAZY of the week. 
Normally this task of handing out this prestigious award is quite simple 
because quite frankly... There are plenty of crazies to choose from as one 
crazy individual stands out among the masses for that week. Simple as 
pie... And i like pie... 
HOWEVER this week proved to be challenging to say the least. You see, we 
have not just ONE nominee for this award... But THREE. With *Coo Coo for 
Coco Puffs* "I will pray the gay away" *Michelle Bachmann* in the running 
this week. The choices become that much harder. HOWEVER! With much 
deliberation through laughter and wetting myself in hysterics the choice 
was made... You see... 
There can be only One! (SFM) CRAZY... For the first time ever for Robbie's 
crazy award of the week, the unthinkable has transpired... The award for 
crazy is generously given to:﻿
top_comment.author: Robbie Adams

comments.text: It just becomes next level at 5:45 =)
comments.author: Jake Heuft

comments.text:
There is no doubt that these two fools are crazy...That's the point for 
this post...
comments.author: Robbie Adams

comments.text: About 5:45 in I think the point is clear.
comments.author: Jake Heuft

comments.text:
I would like to comment that I think you're overly focusing on these nuts 
and not on good information. And as much as I agree with a large amount of 
what the Young Turks says, it is NOT information, it is political 
commentary.

Don't get into the war, just educate yourself.
comments.author: Jake Heuft

top_comment.text:
It's the FalseFlagFag  versus TheYouCan'tExplainThat

Jones challenged O’Reilly to fight after the Fox News anchor linked Jones 
to “hate speech.” Calling him a “bully punk!” O’Reilly played a clip of 
Jones screaming and freaking out, which caused Jones to scream and freak 
out even more!﻿
top_comment.author: Lars DeRuntz

comments.text: Now that is thinking creative!

top_comment.text: This is sad, watching this from another country just explains so much......﻿
top_comment.author: zengara11

comments.text: +zengara11 noonoooplease don't be this stupid please
comments.author: fred davis

comments.text:
+zengara11 At no point did I claim anything about TYT, just about Alex 
Jones. So your first two sentences are contradictory as you make an 
assumption about my position on TYT, which makes you look completely 
incompetent. 

I've met a person who was passionately convinced that he was a vampire. 
That doesn't mean that he's actually a vampire. Alex Jones can scream as 
passionately as he wants all day about how he's right, but that doesn't 
make him right. 

I've watched his "show" before, which again shows that you don't take 
seriously your point about assumptions. Having watched his "show" I can 
conclude that he isn't an intellectual powerhouse, but a raving lunatic. He 
utilizes fallacious and manipulative emotional language, even bordering on 
being meaningless word salad, to support logical fallacies. When that fails 
in the face of criticism, he attempts to use childish name calling and 
threatens to use physical force.
comments.author: ryanlindbergo

comments.text:
Ohhh you take thiese guys seriously? I recommend that you actually look 
into the different pieces of people, before you start ass-umptions.....

This man truely believes in his cause, he dont want to see the people 
enslaved, nor abused because of their position, when it gets so big, it 
makes sense that he gets mad, no infact, I wouldnt trust him if he didnt 
truely comit to it when it is big.

But I guess people would rather want "ass-lickers" or others who keep their 
temper and shut up (moral) when it comes down to what really happend?
Personaly I get that some people would want that, because they are afraid 
that he wouldnt get his point acros, or sound stupid.......
But this video is a great example of him atually standing up to the people, 
try to analyze......instead of just taking everything they changed or 
focused on bs for way to long......

"so he mentions that, you take me out of context, when you are doing this 
on your show, how important is the context really".......

2:51 I personally lliked this part, because it really shows how mad anyone 
can get from something that hits the people......

For some people it takes alot, like this guy, while others dont want to see 
people acting up and simply......fcking up the system for their own behalf.

I hope you atleast read some of it, and have a nice day. 
I also hope that videos like this, where they intensly focus on 1 point 
again and again just to make you think otherwise, wont get you, and you 
actually is seeing what they are doing, and ofc what lies behind all of 
this, instead of talking about a man that you might have no interest in 
knowing about, but still wants to have a saying about him.
comments.author: zengara11

comments.text:
+zengara11 You mean a man that is so intellectually strong that he, instead 
of using actual reasoned arguments, constantly challenges everybody to a 
fist fight?
comments.author: ryanlindbergo

comments.text:
I got nothing but respect for Alex Jones, his speeches is well arguemented 
and well researched....While thiese 3 ppl just make fun od the facebook 
disaster? What is this, jersey shore?
comments.author: zengara11
